title: If you missed it on Black Friday, the Apple Watch Series 9 is back to its all-time low
content:
Macworld

The Apple Watch Series 9 was on sale at Amazon over Black Friday for a new all-time low of $70 off, but if you missed it, it’s back: Amazon is selling the 41mm Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 and the 45mm Apple Watch Series 9 for $379 (after a coupon is applied), a savings of $70 each and the lowest price we’ve seen.

The Apple Watch Series 9 has a new S9 chip that’s faster and smarter than previous generations with a new four-core Neural Engine. It also has the new double-tap gesture that lets you control apps without touching the screen. And of course, you’re getting an excellent 41mm or 45mm display and an incredible array of sensors, including heart rate, ECG, blood-oxygen, and temperature, as well as all-day battery life, 50 meters of water resistance, Emergency SOS and Crash Detection.

In our  review of the Apple Watch Series 9, we called it “the best general-purpose smartwatch Apple has ever made.” And at this all-time low price, it can’t be beat.
